title: Ping issues

replies.body:
There could be a number of factors at play here. Wireless networks can change depending on how many other networks are in the area, channel noise, physical layout of the home, and even materials in the home (stuff like marble and brick really mess up signals). A good place to start in troubleshooting this is to work through the steps outlined in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you noticed any changes after taking those steps.
